name: Improved Awesome Throw
source: Pathfinder #91: Battle of Bloodmarch Hills pg. 69
text: When you perform an awesome throw, you knock opponents back farther.
prerequisites: Str 25, Awesome Throw, Greater Bull Rush, Throw Anything or rock throwing, size Large or larger.
benefit: When you make an awesome throw combat maneuver, for every 5 by which your combat maneuver check exceeds the targetâ€™s CMD, you send the target flying 5 additional feet. Furthermore, this movement provokes attacks of opportunity from your allies.
